quote: I am always serious. Don't make me say it again.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
People die if they are killed.
Believe in the me that believes in you.
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... that's the Pirate King!
It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way.
I'm not gonna be king. I don't want to be king. That's not what I'm after. All I want is to be the strongest!
I don't want to conquer the world. I just want to succeed the world.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.
People's feelings are memories that transcend time.
In our society, letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that.
Even if I can't see you, even if we are separated far apart, I will always be watching after you.
Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! These are the truths of this world!
The world is cruel, and the only morality in a cruel world is chance.
anime_name: The Dark Knight (Not an anime, but a memorable quote)

quote: There's no such thing as a painless lesson; they just don't exist. Sacrifices are necessary. You can't gain anything without losing something first.

If you're gonna insist that evil is something that can be destroyed, then what purpose does that make you serve? We don't need someone to do that. Just seeing other people get along is more than enough. Striving to be the best there is and going as far as you can go—that's what we all should be doing.
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
There's no way I was born to just die.
When you have to save yourself, save your own life. Go as far as you can, and you'll find yourself.
I'm not gonna run. I'm going to stand here with my comrades. It doesn't matter how heavy the burden, I'll keep moving forward.
A sword is a weapon. The art of swordsmanship is learning how to kill. That is the truth.
When you have to save yourself, save your own life. Go as far as you can, and you'll find yourself.
There's no way I was born to just die.
I'm not gonna run. I'm going to stand here with my comrades. It doesn't matter how heavy the burden, I'll keep moving forward.
A sword is a weapon. The art of swordsmanship is learning how to kill. That is the truth.
Don't beg for things. Do it yourself, or else you won't get anything.
The only thing you can change about the past is how you feel about it in the present.
In our society, letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that.
Even if I can't see you, even if we are separated far apart, I will always be watching after you.
Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! These are the truths of this world!
The world is cruel, and the only morality in a cruel world is chance.

"No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite."
"You have to take the good with the bad
column5: and remember what you had. Always forgive
column6: but never forget. Learn from mistakes

quote: "Even if we forget the faces of our friends
character_name: we will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls."

quote: "It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives."
"The world is not beautiful; and that
anime_name: lends it a sort of beauty."

quote: "I am the bone of my sword. Steel is my body
character_name: and fire is my blood. I have created over a thousand blades. Unknown to death. Nor known to life."

quote: "To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have."
"No matter how deep the night
"The only way to deal with fear is to face it head on."
"When you have to save someone
character_name: they're usually in a scary situation. It's a real pain
anime_name: but the other side is that it feels good to be able to save someone."

quote: "It's okay not to be okay as long as you are not giving up."
"Don't forget. Always
anime_name: someone is fighting for you. As long as you remember her

quote: Even if we forget the faces of our friends, we will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls.
It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
The world is not beautiful; and that, in a way, lends it a sort of beauty.
I am the bone of my sword. Steel is my body, and fire is my blood. I have created over a thousand blades. Unknown to death. Nor known to life.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
The only way to deal with fear is to face it head on.
When you have to save someone, they're usually in a scary situation. It's a real pain, but the other side is that it feels good to be able to save someone.
No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.
